title: Easy microwave chocolate cake
ingredients: ['100ml sunflower oil, plus for extra for greasing', '175g caster sugar', '140g plain flour', '3 tablespoons cocoa powder', '3 teaspoons baking powder', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '100ml hot water', '100g milk or dark chocolate, roughly chopped', '5 tablespoons double cream']
